attributes.action: Stop detaining & removal of Zimbabwean failed asylum seekers
attributes.additional_details: Blessing Goronga was detained at IRC Campsfield on the 11th June 2018 and is due to be deported to Zimbabwe anytime . He is a youth leader of the MDC and activist with Restoration of Human Rights (ROHR).
attributes.background: Zimbabwe’s harmonised 2018 elections will be held on the 30th July 2018. Already there has been a grenade thrown at one of the rallies in Bulawayo that has killed 2 people and left another 50 with serious injuries . It is common knowledge that during and elections in Zimbabwe there is violence .

rejection.details:
We've marked your petition as confidential because of the personal information it contains about Blessing Goronga. 

In any case, we can't accept your petition because we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
